reviewText: I admit, I've just bought this set on here (today, 27th june) and I'm expecting it to be sent a day or two after its released and I cannot wait. buying this show in seperate cases will cost you a few extra dollars, but to be honest I could spare the $3 extra this set costs (at the time this was bought it was $169.99)I've watched random episodes here and there and I have to say I love shows that are hard hitting like this one (oz is a perfect other example).Will write a better review once I get the boxset.
summary: corrupt cops, drugs, guns, bribes and hard hitting...Best show!
Title: The Shield - Seasons 1 - 5

reviewText: The first season was hard hitting, new and something quite special, but after about three seasons of pretty much the same thing, it's as if the seasons have run together. Don't get me wrong, I love the show because it's so damn exciting, unfortunately, it never seems to change; thus, my conservative rating.
summary: Over and over and over again!
Title: The Shield - Seasons 1 - 5

reviewText: Buy this series! Tough, hard hitting, multi-dimensional characters, lots of tension and surprises. A must for any collection!
summary: One of the best cop shows out there!
Title: The Shield - Seasons 1 - 5

reviewText: I love this show! It's about corrupt cops and the lengths they go to keep themselves one step ahead of everybody else.
Title: The Shield - Seasons 1 - 5

reviewText: EXCELLENT DRAMA AND REAL...I DONT KNOW HOW THEY DO IT... BUT EA EPISODE IS PULSATING WITH DRAMA AND REALITY.  SEE HOW THE WORLD REALLY IS VS SANITIZED NETWORK TV.  THIS AIRS ON A&E. CHECK THEIR WEBSITE TO FIND NEW SEASON AND OTHER DATA.
summary: YOU GOTTA BE BAD TO GET THE MS 13 GANGS ACROSS THE COUNTRY!!!
